card-581.ifEqual: {{KW:TAUNT}}. In your hand, this has -2 {{COST}} for each {{RARITY:LEGENDARY}} card you played this game (max: -10 {{COST}}). {{KW:MAGIC}}: Add a {{CARD:257|1}} to your hand and deck.
card-581.value: {{KW:TAUNT}}. In your hand, this has -2 {{COST}} for each {{RARITY:LEGENDARY}} you played this game (up to -10). {{KW:MAGIC}}: Add a {{CARD:257|1}} to your hand and deck.

artifact-1.value: At the start of the game, gain +5 {{HP}}.

artifact-3.ifEqual: At the start of the game deal 5 {{DMG}} to your opponent and reduce their max {{HP}} by 5.
artifact-3.value: At the start of the game, reduce the opponent's {{HP}} by 5.

artifact-11.ifEqual: Starts with 5 counters. Whenever you would overdraw a card, spend 1 counter to prevent this.
artifact-11.value: Counter starts at 5. Whenever you would overdraw a card, spend a counter instead.

artifact-18.ifEqual: Whenever an ally monster attacks and kills a monster, it gains +1 {{ATK}}.
artifact-18.value: Whenever an ally monster attacks and kills a monster, give it +1 {{ATK}}.

artifact-20.ifEqual: Counter starts at 4. Whenever you spend {{GOLD}} on a {{KW:GENERATED}} card, reduce the counter by 1. When the counter reaches 0, add a {{CARD:575|1}} to your hand and set the counter to 4.
artifact-20.value: Counter starts at 4. Whenever you spend {{GOLD}} on a {{KW:GENERATED}} card, reduce the counter by 1. Whenever the counter reaches 0, add a {{CARD:575|1}} to your hand and set the counter to 4.

artifact-21.ifEqual: {{KW:TURN_START}}: Restore {{HP:3}} to a random damaged ally monster.
artifact-21.value: {{KW:TURN_START}}: Heal 3 {{HP}} to a random damaged ally monster.

artifact-22.ifEqual: {{KW:TURN_START}}: Give +{{ATK:1}} to a random ally monster.

artifact-23.ifEqual: {{KW:TURN_START}}: Give +{{HP:1}} to a random ally monster.

artifact-25.ifEqual: {{kW:TURN_START}}: Add a {{CARD:537|1}} to your hand. {{KW:TURN_END}}: Remove all {{CARD:537|2}} from your hand.
artifact-25.value: {{KW:TURN_START}}: Add a {{CARD:537|1}} to your hand. {{KW:TURN_END}}: {{KW:BURN}} all {{CARD:537|2}} in your hand.

artifact-28.ifEqual: When you summon a monster with a tribe you haven't summoned this game, add a {{CARD:270|1}} to your hand.
artifact-28.value: Whenever you summon a monster with a tribe you haven't summoned this game (except {{TRIBE:ALL}}), add a {{CARD:270|1}} to your hand.

artifact-36.ifEqual: At the start of the game, burn an ally {{CARD:688|1}} wherever it is. Draw a card if it's in your hand. Transform into the {{ARTIFACT:43}} artifact. Otherwise, add {{CARD:535|1}} to your hand and deck.
artifact-36.value: At the start of the game, {{KW:BURN}} an ally {{CARD:688|1}} wherever it is. Draw a card if it's in your hand. Transform into the {{ARTIFACT:43}} artifact. If you have no {{CARD:688|1}}, add a {{CARD:535|1}} to your hand and deck instead.

artifact-45.ifEqual: Whenever an ally {{CARD:715|1}} is played, increase its counter by 1. When this is disabled, remove all counters from this and add a random {{TRIBE:CHAOS_WEAPON|2}} to your deck for every counter removed.
artifact-45.value: Counter starts at 0. Whenever you play a {{CARD:715|1}}, increase the counter by 1. When this is disabled, remove all counters from this and add a random {{TRIBE:CHAOS_WEAPON|2}} to your deck for every counter removed.

artifact-48.ifEqual: Whenever a monster costing more than 0 dies, gain a counter. When this reaches 4, spend them to gain 1 {{GOLD}}.
artifact-48.value: Whenever a monster costing more than 0 dies, gain a counter. Whenever this reaches 4, spend them to earn 1 {{GOLD}}.

artifact-57.ifEqual: {{KW:TURN_END}}: Earn 1 {{GOLD}}. if it's turn 10 or later, earn 1 more.
